components.description: Explain how themes and developments help to define eras in United States history from 1763 to 1877.

standards.title: Understands and analyzes causal factors that have shaped major events in history.

components.description: Explain and analyze how individuals and movements have shaped United States history (1763-1877).
Explain and analyze how cultures and cultural and ethnic groups have contributed to United States history (1763-1877).
Explain and analyze how technology and ideas have impacted United States history (1763-1877).

standards.title: Understands that there are multiple perspectives and interpretations of historical events.

components.description: Analyze and interpret historical materials from a variety of perspectives in United States history (1763-1877).
Analyze multiple causal factors to create positions on major events in United States history (1763-1877).

standards.title: Understands how historical events inform analysis of contemporary issues and events.

components.description: Analyze how a historical event in United States history helps us to understand contemporary issues and events.
